SEARCH

Uses of Package
shapes

Packages that use shapes
Package
Description
comparators
The comparators package provides comparison logic for sorting Shape objects by height, base area, or volume.
shapes
The shapes package defines various geometric shapes such as cylinders, cones, and pyramids.
utilities
The utilities package provides general-purpose tools that support the main program, including file handling, sorting algorithms, and data processing.
  • Classes in shapes used by comparators
    Class
    Description
    Shape
    The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
  • Classes in shapes used by shapes
    Class
    Description
    Prism
    The Prism class serves as an abstract base for all prism-like shapes.
    Shape
    The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
  • Classes in shapes used by utilities
    Class
    Description
    Shape
    The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
